page.title: 05The Alsager Leisure Centre.
page.content: The leisure centre was opened to the public on January 3rd 1976 and the school has had use of it since 1975. It is open 7 days a week and it offers a range of activities;snooker, trampoline,self-defence,gymnastics, table-tennis,squash and badminton. There is toddler gymnastics for people aged 3-5 years.Popagility,mixed keep- fit and swimming are also a few more. There are 15 instructors,9 full-time and 15 part-time workers and sessional staff ranging from 10-25 people depending on the jobs needed to be done and the flows of people.The Leisure Centre is used by all ages: there is even a 60+ which involves many activities.The prices are reasonable and are arranged by Congleton borough in this area.50 people were interviewed on 1 evening. The most popular activity was swimming
